name: Clockwork Servant
description: The Clockwork Servant is a mechanical helper crafted for domestic tasks, characterized by its sturdy construction and reliable nature. It shows signs of intricate clockwork mechanisms but lacks any defining facial features.
memorable: Immunity to various conditions and spells, making it a dependable ally.
goals: To assist its master with various tasks and minor repairs.
relations: Often created or owned by spellcasters, inventors, or wealthy individuals.
environment: Typically found in workshops, personal estates, or wherever it is summoned to assist.
strengths: Immunity to poison and psychic damage, along with several conditions, enhances its role as a companion.
weaknesses: Not particularly durable with a low armor class and hit points, making it vulnerable in combat.
attacks: A melee slam attack that deals moderate bludgeoning damage to nearby foes.
most_powerful_ability: Magic Resistance, providing advantages against magical influences.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet and a high passive Perception score of 15.
skills: Proficient in Investigation and possesses a high Perception skill, allowing it to notice details effectively.
additional_information: Can cast mending and prestidigitation cantrips at will.
Immutable Form grants immunity to form-altering effects.
Uses its mechanical form for reliable and repetitive tasks.
Can operate without needing direct commands, performing tasks effectively.
Lacks social skills due to very low Charisma.
spellcasting: Can cast mending and prestidigitation cantrips at will.
